# Torrent of Tears (Spell)
## Overview
[[Enchantment Spells|Enchantment]] ([[Compulsion Spells|compulsion]]) \[[[Mind-Affecting Spells|mind-affecting]]]

**Level:** [[2nd Level Bard Spells|Bard 2]], [[2nd Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 2]], [[2nd Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 2]], [[2nd Level Wu Jen Spells|Wu jen 2]] (water)

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 4th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 4]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, M (a single tear)

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Target:** One living creature

**Duration:** 5 rounds

**Saving Throw:** Will negates

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Complete Mage (WotC)Â­, pg. 119

*Tears pour from the subject's eyes, and his body is wracked with sobs.*

You force the subject to cry by drawing forth the water of his tears. For the duration of the spell, the subject is [[Sickened|sickened]] and [[Blinded|blinded]]; a successful Will save negates the effect.
